== Contact the California Team ==

We have several places where discussion and communication occur, so feel free to stop by and chat.

* Mailing list:  (<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-ca|info page]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-us-ca/|archives]]</nowiki>)
* IRC: <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.libera.chat-ubuntu-us-ca|#ubuntu-us-ca]]</nowiki> on irc.libera.chat
** For help with connecting using an IRC program on your computer, see <nowiki>[[InternetRelayChat|Ubuntu's instructions for using IRC]]</nowiki>
** You can also connect using Libera's <nowiki>[[https://web.libera.chat/#ubuntu-us-ca|kiwiirc web client]]</nowiki> or the <nowiki>[[https://web.libera.chat/gamja/#ubuntu-us-ca|web gamja client]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-california|Ubuntu California Launchpad team]]</nowiki> with member list and map
* <nowiki>[[http://identi.ca/ubuntucalifornia|identi.ca]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://twitter.com/ubuntu_us_ca|Twitter]]</nowiki> microblogging feeds
* Facebook: <nowiki>[[http://facebook.com/ubuntu.california/|page]]</nowiki>  (link to old deleted <nowiki>[[http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=33733199182|group]]</nowiki> for reference)
* <nowiki>[[http://california.ubuntuforums.org/|Forum]]</nowiki>
